statements: SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE vehicle_type='Car' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_id, part_name FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts WHERE part_name LIKE '%oil%';
SELECT part_id, part_name, vehicle_type FROM spare_parts ORDER BY vehicle_type, part_name DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE vehicle_type = 'sedan' ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10 AND vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) FROM spare_parts GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type FROM spare_parts;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts WHERE part_name LIKE '%brake%' AND quantity < 20 ORDER BY part_name ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts_inventory;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supply_name FROM vehicle_maintenance_supplies WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT part_id, part_name FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_supplies ORDER BY supply_name ASC;
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY part_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE part_name LIKE '%oil%'
SELECT part_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM spare_parts_inventory GROUP BY part_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_supplies ORDER BY available_quantity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE quantity < (SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM spare_parts_inventory)
SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT part_name, quantity, unit_price FROM spare_parts
SELECT vehicle_type, model_year, manufacturer FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota'
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity, unit_price FROM spare_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE mechanic_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, model_year, manufacturer FROM vehicles WHERE max_capacity >= 5 ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC, model_year DESC;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_date, mechanic_name FROM maintenance_records WHERE mechanic_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT part_name, unit_price FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10 AND unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, model_year, manufacturer FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'T%' ORDER BY model_year DESC, vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM inventory_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT maintenance_date, mechanic, description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE mechanic = 'John Doe';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM inventory_suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE 'John%';
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC, manufacturer ASC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, mechanic FROM maintenance_logs WHERE mechanic IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM SpareParts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM SpareParts WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT part_name, unit_price FROM SpareParts ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE year >= 2020;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, description FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT Vehicles.vehicle_id, Vehicles.vehicle_type, SpareParts.part_name, SpareParts.unit_price FROM Vehicles INNER JOIN SpareParts ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = SpareParts.part_id WHERE SpareParts.quantity > 10;
SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, MaintenanceTasks.task_name, MaintenanceTasks.cost FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN MaintenanceTasks ON Suppliers.supplier_id = MaintenanceTasks.task_id ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer, year FROM Vehicles WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'Toy%' ORDER BY year ASC;
